thread.title: First Look at Emily Blunt as 'Mary Poppins' -- See the Newly Released Pic!
thread.title_full: First Look at Emily Blunt as 'Mary Poppins' -- See the Newly Released Pic!

author: Alex Ungerman
title: First Look at Emily Blunt as 'Mary Poppins' -- See the Newly Released Pic!
text: First Look at Emily Blunt as 'Mary Poppins' -- See the Newly Released Pic! by Alex Ungerman 3:22 PM PST, March 03, 2017 Photo: Getty Images Emily Blunt is a perfect choice to play everyone's favorite nanny! The first photo of the 34-year-old actress taking on the iconic titular role in Mary Poppins Returns -- Disney's upcoming sequel to the classic 1964 film -- has been released, and while it offers only a facially obscured glimpse of the magical nanny, the flower-adorned hat, tailored jacket, and bag are already unmistakable. Photo: Walt Disney Pictures EXCLUSIVE: Dick Van Dyke Opens Up About Joining 'Mary Poppins' Sequel: 'I Gotta Be a Part of It' While we'll have to wait awhile -- until Christmas 2018 -- for the film to umbrella fly into theaters, in December ET spoke to Dick Van Dyke, who opened up about his cameo in Mary Poppins Returns , after playing multiple roles in the original picture. "I'll be going to London in the spring to do my role, and I get to do a little song-and-dance number," the 91-year-old actor explained. "I gotta be a part of it." Watch the video below for more. RELATED SLIDESHOW
